name: d20 Dice Roller for Protoype Mode
description:
Add this to your prototypes to allow viewers to easily roll a 20-sided dice.


How this works:

On mouse over (or on tap for mobile users) activates an invisible overlay. The overlay automatically cycles through 20 different invisible overlays every 1ms. Clicking any of the overlays swaps out the overlay with the a pre-defined number. The numbers are not in a consecutive order making it harder to cheat. Technically, non-random but in practice virtually impossible to cheat.
